oracle.pg.rdbms.index.oratext

Class OracleTextAutoIndex<T extends com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Element>

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.rdbms.index.oratext.OracleTextAutoIndex<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Index<T>, OracleAutoIndex<T>, OracleIndex<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RDBMSOracleTextEdgeAutoIndex, RDBMSOracleTextVertexAutoIndex

    public abstract class OracleTextAutoIndex<T extends com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Element>
extends java.lang.Object
implements OracleAutoIndex<T>
    This class implements the OracleAutoIndex interface to handle text search and text indexing using Oracle Text.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface oracle.pg.text.OracleIndex

    • Constructor Detail

      • OracleTextAutoIndex

        public OracleTextAutoIndex(java.lang.String indexName,
                           java.lang.Class<T> indexClass,
                           OraclePropertyGraphBase oraclePropertyGraph,
                           com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Parameter[] indexParameters,
                           boolean clear)
        Constructs a new LuceneIndex object.
        Parameters:
        indexName - the name of the index
        indexClass - the element class that this index is indexing (can be base class)
        oraclePropertyGraph - an OraclePropertyGraphBase object.
        indexParameters - a collection of parameters for the underlying index implementation.
        clear - a boolean specifying if the index should be cleared at the beginning.

      • buildSearchTerm

        public final java.lang.String buildSearchTerm(java.lang.String key,
                                              java.lang.Object value,
                                              java.lang.Class dtClass)
        Builds a search term query expression in the syntax required by this index.
        Specified by:
        buildSearchTerm in interface OracleIndex<T extends com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Element>
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the K/V property
        value - the value object of the K/V property
        dtClass - the class representing the datatype of the property value. This can be used to cast the property value to a different datatype. For example, if the value is "3.01" and dtClass is Float.Class, then this value will be treated as a 3.01f.

        public boolean containsIndexedKey(java.lang.String key)
        Verifies if the given key is already indexed using this automatic index.
        Specified by:
        containsIndexedKey in interface OracleAutoIndex<T extends com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Element>
        Parameters:
        key - the key to validate
        Returns:
        true if the key is indexed in this automatic index, else false.

      • count

        public final long count(java.lang.String key,
                        java.lang.Object value)
        Counts all the matching elements that have a particular key/value property within the index
        Specified by:
        count in interface com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Index<T extends com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Element>
        Parameters:
        key - the name of the property. It MUST not be NULL. If the key is not found in the index, the result will be 0.
        value - the value object of the property. It can be NULL which will cause all elements with the given key to be returned.
        Returns:
        a CloseableIterable object.

        acceptWildcard - specifies if wild cards can be used in the value object. the index

      • getPartitioned

        public final com.tinkerpop.blueprints.CloseableIterable<T>[] getPartitioned(java.lang.Object[] connections,
                                                                            java.lang.String key,
                                                                            java.lang.Object value,
                                                                            boolean acceptWildcard,
                                                                            int startShardId)
        Gets an array of CloseableIterable objects that hold all the elements with an attribute matching the given K/V pair. Each element in the CloseableIterable array uses a separate connection provided to fetch a subset of the results from an Oracle Text index.
        Specified by:
        getPartitioned in interface OracleIndex<T extends com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Element>
        Parameters:
        connections - an array of connections to the index. Each element of this array should be of type Oracle.
        key - the key of a property
        value - the value object of the property.
        acceptWildcard - specifies if wild cards can be used in the value object.
        startShardId - the ID of the starting shard.
        Returns:
        a CloseableIterable object.

      • query

        public final com.tinkerpop.blueprints.CloseableIterable<T> query(java.lang.String key,
                                                                 java.lang.Object value)
        Query for all the elements satisfying the specified K/V property within the index
        Specified by:
        query in interface com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Index<T extends com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Element>
        Parameters:
        key - the name of the property. It MUST not be NULL. If the key is not found in the index, the result will be 0.
        value - the value object of the property. It can be NULL which will cause all elements with the given key to be returned.
        Returns:
        a CloseableIterable object.
